title.jp: Koumei who Stands in Opposition, the Freeing of Rikuson the Crimson at Koutou

synopsis: Rikuson, traveling the world full of wars, finds Sonsaku's "Light of Shining Star" in the battlefield in which the kingdom of Go and the kingdom of Gi fight.

title.jp: Rikuson at a Loss, his Discovery of Sonken in Go's Capital

synopsis: After finding the Hereditary Seal, Rikuson obtains the Power of Shining Star. However, right before his eyes, Sonsaku gets assassinated by someone, and the Hereditary Seal is stolen again.

title.jp: Assemble at Koutou's lands, young patriots

synopsis: An arrow comes at Sonken, but Rikuson stops it with the Power of Shining Star.

title.jp: The Lone-Eyed Hero Entrusts Ryoutou with the Principles of a Warrior

synopsis: The army of Kouso suddenly invades Go. Following that, Rikuson and his people go to have a battle against them.

title.jp: A Grieving Ryoutou Roars in Agony as he Hunts Down a Bitter Enemy

synopsis: Go made many sacrifices in the battle against the Kouso army. Because of Sonken's life, revenge against a prisoner has been prohibited, but Ryoto blatantly expresses his rage against Kannei to Rikuson.

title.jp: In his Sorrow, Kannei of Suzu, Shoots an Arrow into the Battlefield

synopsis: After finishing Kouso with the Shining Star, the Hereditary Seal is now with Komei. Rikuson is shocked by words brought by Kannei.

title.jp: A Bewildered Rikuson Sees the Light in a Reunion with his Teacher

synopsis: The letter from Gi to Go inwardly asks for surrender, implicating the possession of the Hereditary Seal.

title.jp: Shokatsuryou Koumei Inspires Sonken of Go with his Idea

synopsis: Should the kingdom of Go surrender to Gi or fight back in full measure? A military meeting is held to debate over these two different opinions.

title.jp: The Young Warriors Assemble at Koutou's Hills and Rivers for Training

synopsis: Having a war against Gi ahead, Rikuson, Ryoto, Ryomo and Shokatsukin participate in the training camp of the Go army.

title.jp: Sou Moutoku Pushes a Red Wall, Drawing Near Son Go

synopsis: A giant battleship that Gi has built appears at Choukou River.

title.jp: Go's Six Steeds Cause the Dawn Over Choukou to Gleam Red

synopsis: To stop Gi's battleship, Shokuyu's plan begins to be in action. Taishiji and his colleagues sneak into the battleship.

title.jp: Ingenuity and Cunning, the Sound of the Ominous Flute Reverberates Across the Lake Shore

synopsis: The capital of Go is full of victory fever. Shokuyu is doubtful about Komei's remarkable talent of even summoning a storm.

title.jp: Bi Shuurou Stands Upon the Battlefield to Guide Rikuson

synopsis: Rikuson saves Komei and extricates him from Go. In return, Rikuson asks Komei to entrust the mission of retrieving the Hereditary Seal to him.

title.jp: The Wail of Son Go Wavers in Repose Offered by the Six Steeds

synopsis: Go pays a huge sacrifice for retrieving the Hereditary Seal.

title.jp: Gloomy Rikuson Vows to Recover with Sonken's Smile

synopsis: After three months have passed from the state funeral, Rikushun takes a few days of rest.

title.jp: Kan'u's Roar Strikes Rikuson which Forces him to Hold Determination

synopsis: The Hereditary Seal is stolen from Go again. Rikuson is confused after hearing that such happened according to Komei's command.

title.jp: Reunion at the Thatched Hut, the Deep Connection Between Master and Disciple, Wedged Together in Ekishuu

synopsis: At a hut in Shoku, Rikuson rendezvous with Komei.

title.jp: The Sworn Brothers of the Peach Garden see the Flower of Ties in the Fields and Mountains of Shoku

synopsis: With the help from Taishiji group, Rikuson and Ryoto escape from Chouhi. They decide to return to Go.

title.jp: Courageous Taishiji Stands Tall on the Earth of the Central Plains

synopsis: To return to Go, Rikuson has to pass through Kouso. Kanoo and Zhao Yun never stop pursuing them and set a fire to the village of Kouryou.

title.jp: Amou of Go Rises from Obscurity by Using His Young Wisdom

synopsis: Rikushun is in great grief after losing a precious colleague.

title.jp: Kouryou's Setting Sun Seizes a Warrior's Soul

synopsis: To captured Kanoo, Sonken makes a generous deal in an effort to use the power rightfully for his people.

title.jp: Ryuubi Goes Insane and Becomes a Frozen Shadow Wandering in Koutou

synopsis: Ryubi's passion for Kanoo and Chouhi finally turns into rage against Rikushun.

title.jp: Son Chuubou, in the Snowfield, Follows Rikuson to Escape from his Homeland

synopsis: After escaping from the capital of Go, Sonken wanders around the wilderness with Rikuson.

title.jp: Ryuubi's Weeping Gives a New Light to the Field

synopsis: Rikuson is knocked down with Ryubi's blow. Before his eyes, Sonken gets injured as well.

title.jp: Riku Hakugen Dances on Gojougen Where Red Stars are Falling

synopsis: At Gozhang, the place where Red Stars fall, Rikuson and Komei finally come across each other.
